blogPost.excerpt: Mobilo Wood Card resembles the ecological aspirations of our brand. With this brand new, one-of-its-kind, NFC-powered, smart business card, we want to provide an opportunity for companies to truly distance themselves from paper waste.
blogPost.body: Mobilo Wood Card resembles the ecological aspirations of our brand. With this brand new, one-of-its-kind, NFC-powered, smart business card, we want to provide an opportunity for companies to truly distance themselves from paper waste.
blogPost.title: Mobilo Wood - Smart business card made of wood
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 美宝乐木卡与我们品牌的生态诉求相仿。我们希望通过这种全新的、独一无二的、由NFC驱动的智能名片，为企业提供一个真正远离纸张浪费的机会。
美寶樂木卡與我們品牌的生態訴求相仿。我們希望通過這種全新的、獨一無二的、由NFC驅動的智能名片，爲企業提供一個真正遠離紙張浪費的機會。

previous.excerpt: Vinyls is a beautiful music player built with iOS design guidelines in mind. There are no complicated user accounts or settings to configure. You can start listening to your music right away. You can scrub to seek, watch the tone arm follow the playback time.
previous.title: Vinyls - A beautiful music player for iOS

localize.description: Vinyls是一款以iOS设计准则打造的精美音乐播放器。没有复杂的用户账户或设置配置。你可以马上开始听你的音乐。你可以擦拭寻找，看音臂跟随播放时间。
localize.tagline: iOS上的一款精美的音乐播放器

localize.description: Vinyls是一款以iOS設計準則打造的精美音樂播放器。沒有複雜的用戶賬戶或設置配置。你可以馬上開始聽你的音樂。你可以擦拭尋找，看音臂跟隨播放時間。
localize.tagline: iOS上的一款精美的音樂播放器
